item.title: My tilt asciinema cast
item.description: Today I read agones site and noticed it play asciinema cast in its home page. I wondered if I can put my asciinema cast into my blog. Here is my one. AsciinemaPlayer.create('/a/497308.cast', document.getElementById('497308'), { }); The cast is about how to use titl for local micro-service development based on kubernetes.
